DOC.brief_summary: This study is being conducted to assess the safety and tolerability of ascending multiple oral doses of SCA-136 administered to healthy Japanese male subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating the Safety and Tolerability of SCA-136 in Healthy Japanese Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Healty Japanese men willing to use a medically acceptable form of contraception. Exclusion criteria: Any significant disease Positive urine drug screen Increased liver function tests Use of prescription drugs.
